thread.title: Transneft North, JSC has conducted drills on emergency response in swampland (OAO AK Transneft)
thread.title_full: Transneft North, JSC has conducted drills on emergency response in swampland (OAO AK Transneft) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Transneft North, JSC has conducted drills on emergency response in swampland (OAO AK Transneft)
text: ( Source : OAO AK Transneft) Transneft North , JSC has conducted emergency response drill ( ERD ) at the linear portion of Ukhta - Yaroslavl oil trunk pipeline (OTPL). The drills were devoted to elimination of possible emergencies on the oil
